patterns: What is the mission of MREC (A)?
responses: MREC (A) aims to equip engineering students to become industry-ready by organizing seminars, workshops, and mentoring sessions.

patterns: Who is the Director of MREC (A)?
responses: Dr. A. Ramaswami Reddy is the Director and Principal of MREC (A).
MREC (A) has received the LINACSE Best Reviewer Award in 2019-2020 and 2020-2021. Dr. S. Radhakrishnan also received the Bharat Shiksha Award.

patterns: What are the highlights of MREC (A)?
responses: The institution is accredited by NBA and NAAC, has over 250 campus recruiters, MoUs with reputed institutions, and is ranked as the Best Engineering College in South India.

patterns: When was the CSE (Data Science) department established?
responses: The CSE (Data Science) department was established in 2021 under the guidelines of JNTUH and AICTE.

patterns: What are the highlights of the CSE (Data Science) department?
responses: It features research-oriented faculty, strong industry collaborations, excellent placement records, and alumni working at top companies like IBM and Microsoft.

patterns: Who is the head of the CSE (Data Science) department?
responses: Dr. S. Shiva Prasad is the Professor and Head of the Department for Data Science.

patterns: How does MREC (A) support student development?
responses: The college supports students through seminars, focus groups, one-on-one mentoring, and active student development centers.

patterns: What industry connections does the CSE department have?
responses: The department maintains strong ties with companies like IBM, Microsoft, and Oracle, and emphasizes hands-on programming experience.
Yes, it is accredited by both NBA and NAAC.
